campaign.levelsTitle: Welcome Back ##FirstName##, Upgrade your Membership Today!

rightColumn.title: Additional Benefits
rightColumn.footer: Upgrade today to receive a FREE divot fixing tool!

membershipLevel.privileges:
• Unrestricted access to the online USGA Member Clubhouse
  • Advance opportunity to purchase U.S. Open 7-day ticket packages
  • Behind-the-scenes volunteer opportunities at USGA Championships
  • Invitations to exclusive USGA Member events
membershipLevel.benefits:
• Members-only U.S. Open hat
  • Latest edition of the Rules of Golf
  • USGA bag tag and Member ID card
  • Clubhouse Insider e-newsletter

levels.description: Upgrade as a Champion Club Member to increase your support and your benefits. As a part of our Champion Club, you will receive the following privileges and benefits, as well as honor the traditions of the game you love.

rightColumn.title: Additional Benefits
rightColumn.footer: Upgrade today to receive a FREE hat!

membershipLevel.privileges:
• Unrestricted access to the online USGA Member Clubhouse
  • Advance opportunity to purchase U.S. Open 7-day ticket packages
  • Behind-the-scenes volunteer opportunities at USGA Championships
  • Invitations to exclusive USGA Member events
membershipLevel.benefits:
• Members-only U.S. Open hat
  • Latest edition of the Rules of Golf
  • USGA bag tag and Member ID card
  • Clubhouse Insider e-newsletter
  • USGA Championship Calendar

levels.description: Upgrade to an Eagle Club Member to take your place among the guardians of the game. As a part of our Eagle Club, you will receive the following privileges and benefits, and be able to represent your support in even more ways.

rightColumn.title: Additional Benefits
rightColumn.footer: Upgrade today to receive a FREE hat!
